content: Well, Iâ€™ve just started watching the final. we have many participants from both countries here.... so Iâ€™m supporting both countries. But.... may the Dutch win!
Thanks Grahame. We need all the support we can get!
We're the best at losing the finals
There's true equality between the Dutch men and women team now - both lost a WC!

You guys do the world cup right, though. When I was in Den Bosch in 2014, felt like every possible institution suddenly had TVs and beer and people watching the matches outside. Even the local bike store.
And you would have thought the city was under attack or something after you beat Spain that first game. Insanity.
Seems to me there ought to be some sort of "per capita" award. On that basis, China would never win anything and smaller countries would get proper recognition for their achievements!
You're proposing the electoral college for the World Cup?
